data.question: What is the highest C2H2 uptake capacity among the UPC-200 systems at 273 K?
Which UPC-200 material demonstrates the highest IAST C2H2/CO2 selectivity at 110 kPa?
What is the effect of substituting the H3TTCA ligand with H3TTCA-F in UPC-200(Fe)-H-H2O?
data.answer: It results in the formation of UPC-200(Fe)-F-H2O.

data.question: How does the modification of SBUs with benzimidazole affect the UPC-200 structure?
data.answer: It leads to the formation of UPC-200(Fe)-H-BIM, indicating the multifunctional modification of pore environment in a MOF.

data.question: What is the BET surface area of UPC-200(Fe)-F-H2O?
True or False: UPC-200(Fe)-F-H2O has a higher BET surface area compared to UPC-200(Fe)-F-IM.
Which functional group modification leads to the highest BET surface area in the UPC-200(Fe) series?
What is the role of dual modification of multifunctional ligands and metal sites in UPC-200 frameworks?
data.answer: It optimizes the properties of MOF by introducing functional groups and modifying SBU, enriching the family of isoreticular MOFs.

data.question: True or False: UPC-200(Fe)-F-BIM has a lower C2H2 adsorption capacity at 273 K compared to UPC-200(Fe)-F-H2O.
What is the impact of incorporating benzimidazole-modified SBU and H3TTCA-F ligand in the same structure of UPC-200?
data.answer: It results in the optimized material UPC-200(Fe)-F-BIM with high C2H2 uptake and C2H2/CO2 selectivity.
